name: hypnic
description:
hypnic is a shooter made for  OpenGameArt's game jam #2. It is currently still in development, so check back!

It is created in engo, an open-source ecs game engine for the Go programming language!

My plan is to make a typical shooter with a mystical / dreamlike / meditative feel that you control via the accelerometer on android / iOS. Idk. I thought it would be fun. I'll also do a desktop version (which will use the keyboard or mouse. It'll probably be backup for android or iOS devices when they don't have or want to grant access to the accelerometer)

Check out the development on GitHub!
